text: iʿ'lamu annama l-hayatu l-dun'ya laʿibun walahwun wazinatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fi l-amwali wal-awladi kamathali ghaythin aʿjaba l-kufara nabatuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yakunu hutaman wafi l-akhirati ʿadhabun shadidun wamaghfiratun mina l-lahi warid'wanun wama l-hayatu l-dun'ya illa mataʿu l-ghururi
